Entries.default: "Wonder if it's too late for a trial by combat."
"Need I remind you of what happened the last time we interrupted a trial..."
"All right, we're gonna go in there and pretend to be judges, and say this is an illegal trial and now they're on trial."
"In the Republics, judges do not wear masks, only executioners."
<ispeech>Never were fond of courts. Always favored my own justice.</ispeech>
"Would you say this is going to be a trial by fire...?"
